name: Scandic Aalborg City
description: This charming hotel in Aalborg offers free wireless internet, as well as a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. It is ideally located for guests wishing to discover the area's attractions. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Scandic Aalborg City offer a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom. They all feature ironing facilities, a telephone and heating. Those looking for a meal and wanting to stay nearby needn't look any further than Scandic Aalborg City's in-house restaurant, which is ideally available each day for breakfast. For guests on the move, the hotel provides packed lunches if needed. The hotel is close to Aalborg Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Aalborg and its surrounding areas. It is also perfectly situated close to a range of dining options.Revato

name: Kompas Hotel Aalborg
description: Brand new rooms in the heart of Aalborg You could hardly wish for a better location in Aalborg - whether you are on an extended weekend, city break, business trip or something else entirely. Kompas Hotel, BW Signature Collection is a charming hotel, centrally located in relation to Aalborg's new and exciting waterfront with Musikkens Hus, and the cozy pedestrian streets and vibrant life of the North Jutland capital are just around the corner. You must experience the newly renovated waterfront with world-class architecture, cozy parks, gourmet restaurants in former warehouses while enjoying the view of the Limfjord. Shopping opportunities are plentiful in Aalborg, where one of the pedestrian streets is only 5 minutes away from the hotel on foot. So, explore Aalborg, where you'll always find new places, different experiences, exciting stories and true city vibes. The capital of North Jutland is a gem that never disappoints and an ideal destination for a mini-break or a weekend break.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Aalborg Øst
description: This comfortable hotel in Aalborg offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as free bicycle rental and a sauna. It also features meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage, a concierge and room service. It is pet-friendly and has free private parking on site for guests with a car. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and has an in-room safe, a desk and blackout curtains. There are also several rooms geared towards families. Scandic Aalborg Ost offers a variety of in-house dining options, including a cosy restaurant and a bar. Scandic Aalborg Ost is within walking distance of Aalborg University. Aalborgtarnet, Aalborghus Castle and Budolfi Church are only an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Pier 5 Hotel
description: Pier 5 Hotel features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and bar in Aalborg. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 400 metres from Aalborghus. Some rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Pier 5 Hotel include Monastry of the holy ghost, Aalborg Historical Museum and Vor Frue Church. The nearest airport is Aalborg Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Radisson Blu Limfjord Hotel, Aalborg
description: Just 6 km from Aalborg Airport in North Jutland, this modern hotel offers free sauna access, free Wi-Fi and an in-house casino. Aalborg Train Station is 10 minutes’ walk away. Radisson Blu Limfjord Hotel’s modern rooms have cable and satellite TV, tea/coffee facilities and a seating area. Some offer views of Aalborg city centre and the Limfjord. Restaurant Brasserie Pascal uses local quality ingredients to create classic French dishes. The hotel lounge offers a selection of drinks and a relaxed setting with piano melodies. The main pedestrian street, Jomfru Ane Gade, is just around the corner. It has charming cafés, bars and cultural attractions.

name: Helnan Phønix Hotel
description: This hotel is located in a stylish 18th-century building, just across the street from Algade shopping street. It offers an old-fashioned charm, modern facilities and rooms with free WiFi. All rooms at Phønix Hotel feature classic décor, as well as a TV, work desk and safe. Guests can work out in the fitness centre with treadmills, exercise bikes and weights. The restaurants and nightlife at Jomfru Ane Street is a 3-minute walk away, while Nytorv Square is 750 metres from the hotel.
